title: Gerald's Game Movie Revisited
itunes:title: Gerald's Game Movie Revisited
itunes:subtitle: The Losers take off the cuffs and kick back on the cabin couch to revisit Mike Flanagan's Gerald's Game. Together, they discuss what makes the source material so complicated for the screen, Bruce Greenwood's unbelievable physique, and wh...
description:
The Losers take off the cuffs and kick back on the cabin couch to revisit Mike Flanagan's Gerald's Game. Together, they discuss what makes the source material so complicated for the screen, Bruce Greenwood's unbelievable physique, and why the dog should have been voiced by Jim Belushi. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
